game_description: Ethereal Land is a spiritual sanctuary for those huddled masses yearning to breathe free who want to escape the day's demands, zone out from reality and find their inner peace. Our soothing immersive stories might touch a chord with you, or it would bring a whole new perspective on your piece of mind, a refreshing experience. With a customizable weather system, you could project your feeling and mindset to an environment you see fit. We hope you can escape the day's demand and find your inner peace here.

review_4: One of my favorite meditation/relaxing apps on MetaQuest 2. The VR journey was beautiful, dreamlike and very immersive. I also love the different environments where I can sit, meditate and relax. The app makes me feel very calm and refreshed. Thank you developers for creating such a wonderful app!
review_5: First, thank you developers for this enjoyable game, love its artwork, presentation and beautiful design. But may I ask for more please , because it worked , I felt peaceful and relaxing using it every night before sleep. Music are enjoyable, more please if possible.
